AncientTable_Description: It's covered in the thickest cobwebs.
AutoGrabber_Description: Automatically harvests from your animals each morning. Must be placed inside a coop or barn.
AutoPetter_Description: Joja Co. patented technology for coops and barns. Keeps your animals content, but can't replace the full benefit of human touch. Hand-petting can be provided to supplement.
BarrelBrazier_Description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
BasicLog_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
BeeHouse_Description: Place outside and wait for delicious honey! (Except in Winter).
BigGreenCane_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
BigRedCane_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
Bongo_Description: A decorative percussion instrument with a rich sound.
Boulder_Description: An extremely dense piece of stone.
Camera_Description: An old camera mounted on a tripod.
Campfire_Description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
CarvedBrazier_Description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
Cask_Description: Use in the cellar to age products like wine and cheese.
CharcoalKiln_Description: Turns 10 pieces of wood into one piece of coal.
Chest_Description: A place to store your items.
ChickenStatue_Description: A wooden statue of a chicken.
CoffeeMaker_Description: Automatically brews a fresh cup every morning.
Crystalarium_Description: Insert a gem of your choice and it will grow copies.
CursedPKArcadeSystem_Description: Something's not right with this Prairie King Arcade System...
DarkSign_Description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.
DeadTree_Description: It's been petrified for a long time, poor thing.
Deconstructor_Description: Destroys crafted items, but salvages their most valuable material.
DeluxeScarecrow_Description: Prevents crows from attacking your crops. Has a large radius (about 16 "tiles").
Door_Description: A hidden mechanism causes it to retract into the ground.
EmptyCapsule_Description: Part of the glass is shattered.
FarmComputer_Description: Scans the farm and displays useful information.
FeedHopper_Description: Provides convenient access to silo fodder.
Furnace_Description: Turns ore and coal into metal bars.
GardenPot_Description: Grows crops from any season when indoors. Outdoors, it can only house seasonal crops.
GoldBrazier_Description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
GrandfatherClock_Description: It's so old... looks like the pendulum is rusted in place.
GraveStone_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
GreenCanes_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
Heater_Description: Keeps your animals warmer and happier during the winter.
HeavyTapper_Description: Place on a maple, oak, or pine tree and wait for the reservoir to fill with product! Works twice as fast as a normal tapper.
Hopper_Description: Items placed inside will automatically be loaded into the machine in front of it.
HousePlant_Description: Adds some character to your home or farm.
Incubator_Description: Hatches eggs into baby chickens and ducks.
IronLamppost_Description: Provides a good amount of light.
ItemPedestal_Description: A place to display an item.
JunimoChest_Description: Through the power of forest magic, every Junimo Chest links to the same stash.
Keg_Description: Place a fruit or vegetable in here. Eventually it will turn into a beverage.
LawnFlamingo_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
LightningRod_Description: Collects energy from lightning storms and turns it into battery packs.
LockedDoor_Description: A hidden mechanism causes it to retract into the ground.
LogSection_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
Loom_Description: Turns raw wool into fine cloth.
MarbleBrazier_Description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
MiniFridge_Description: Allows you to store additional ingredients for cooking.
MiniJukebox_Description: Allows you to play your favorite tunes.
MiniObelisk_Description: Place two on the farm to warp between them.
MiniShippingBin_Description: Items placed in it will be included in the nightly shipment.
MixedCane_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
Obelisk_Description: A sinister-looking portal that radiates with evil energy.
ObsidianVase_Description: A beautifully crafted ornamental vase made from obsidian and gold.
OrnamentalHayBale_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
OstrichIncubator_Description: Hatches ostrich eggs into baby ostriches. Place in a barn.
PlushBunny_Description: It's big, it's soft, and it's cute.
PrairieKingArcadeSystem_Description: Play 'Journey Of The Prairie King' at home!
PreservesJar_Description: Turns vegetables into pickles and fruit into jam.
RedCanes_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
RitualMask_Description: It's way too large to wear.
Scarecrow_Description: Prevents crows from attacking your crops. Has a limited radius (about 8 "tiles").
SeasonalDecor_Description: This decoration changes with the seasons.
SeasonalPlant_Description: An ornamental plant that changes with each season. It doesn't need to be watered.
SeedMaker_Description: Place crops inside to produce a varying amount of seeds. Doesn't work with fruit tree crops.
SewingMachine_Description: Use to tailor clothes from the convenience of your home!
SignOfTheVessel_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
SingingStone_Description: It rings out with a pure tone when struck.
SkullBrazier_Description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
SlimeEggPress_Description: Compresses 100 pieces of slime into a slime egg. It's a miracle of science!
SlimeIncubator_Description: Hatches slimes eggs into slimes. Allows you to raise slimes outdoors.
SlothSkeletonL_Description: This extinct sloth roamed the lush, prehistoric forests of Stardew Valley. Its powerful jaw tore through the toughest plant fibers.
SlothSkeletonM_Description: The ribs of a prehistoric sloth.
SlothSkeletonR_Description: The hind legs and tail of a prehistoric sloth.
SodaMachine_Description: Keeps pumping out the good stuff.
SolarPanel_Description: Slowly generates batteries when left in the sun.
Staircase_Description: Use this to move down a level in the mines.
StandingGeode_Description: It's a huge geode mounted on a stand. Hundreds of purple crystals shimmer within.
StardewHeroTrophy_Description: The most prestigious award a Stardew Valley resident could receive!
StatueOfEndlessFortune_Description: It's made of solid gold. What's it for?
StoneBrazier_Description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
StoneCairn_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
StoneChest_Description: A place to store your items.
StoneOwl_Secret_Description: It's not clear where this came from, but it looks very fine.
StoneSign_Description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.
StrangeCapsule_Description: There's something fleshy bobbing around in the fluid...
StumpBrazier_Description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
SuitOfArmor_Description: A decorative piece for your farm.
TablePieceL_Description: The left side of a big table.
TablePieceR_Description: The right side of a big table
TallTorch_Description: The stem is made from bamboo.
Tapper_Description: Place on a maple, oak, or pine tree and wait for the reservoir to fill with product!
TeddyTimer_Description: It's a grandfather clock shaped like a teddy.
Telephone_Description: Can be used to check store hours and inventory.
TuboFlowers_Description: Flowers planted in an oak barrel. Blooms in spring and summer.
WickedStatue_Description: There's something unsettling about the looks of this statue.
WickedStatue_LitEyes_Description: Something's not right with this statue.
WoodChair_Description: A chair that can be oriented in 4 different ways.
WoodChipper_Description: Insert a piece of hardwood to break it down into regular wood.
WoodenBrazier_Description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
WoodLamppost_Description: Provides a good amount of light.
WoodSign_Description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.
Workbench_Description: When crafting here, you'll have access to materials in any adjacent chests.
WormBin_Description: Produces bait on a regular basis. The worms are self-sufficient.
TextSign_Description: A small sign that can be written on.
MushroomLog_Description: Grows mushrooms every so often. The more wild trees are nearby, the better it works.
BaitMaker_Description: Place a fish inside to create targeted bait.
Dehydrator_Description: Place 5 pieces of fruit or edible mushrooms inside to dry them.
HeavyFurnace_Description: Processes 5 bars at a time. Requires 25 pieces of ore and 3 coal per use.
StatueOfBlessings_Description: Touching the statue gives a unique blessing every day.
StatueOfTheDwarfKing_Description: Choose from two mining-related powers each day.
Anvil_Description: Allows you to "re-roll" trinkets. Costs 3 iridium bars per use.
MiniForge_Description: Now, you can use a dwarvish forge from the convenience of your home.
